attributes.action: Treat all persons in the U.K.the same .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So all drugs and treatments are the same for all persons in the U.K. Not down to postcode or cost.

rejection.details: Please provide a clear call to action in the title of your petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
